Name: CMMG Mk54 Mutant 7.62x54r Rifle
Description: Modified CMMG Mk47 Mutant, American-made carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm, manufactured by CMMG Inc. Works with all types of SVD magazines, including steel, polymer and drums. The rifle has shown exceptional reliability, which, together with the classic ergonomics of the AR system, gives an excellent example of a firearm. This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only. Modified to fire 7.62x54mmr.
